								<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix">
				<p style="text-align: justify;">Monochrome Games™ respects the privacy of its online visitors and users of its products. Monochrome Games recognizes the importance of protecting any information collected from users and has adopted this privacy policy that guides how Monochrome Games gathers, stores, and uses information from the use of Monochrome Games products and online sites by users.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">This policy is current as of its last revision date. However, please note that this policy may be amended from time to time to reflect changes and additions to the privacy policy. Please check back for the most current version before relying on any of the provisions in this privacy policy.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><strong style="color: #adadad; font-size: 18px;">Collection and Use of Information
</strong>By using Monochrome Games online sites and products, users agree that Monochrome Games may collect aggregate information, individual information, and personally identifiable information, as defined below. Monochrome Games may share aggregate information and individual information with other parties. Monochrome Games shall not share personally identifiable information with other parties, except as described in the policy below.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">“Aggregate information” is information that describes the habits, usage patterns, and demographics of users as a group but does not describe or reveal the identity of any particular user.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">“Individual information” is information about a user that is presented in a form distinguishable from information relating to other users but not in a form that personally identifies any user or enables the recipient to communicate directly with any user unless agreed to by the user in advance of such communication. This information may be used to improve Monochrome Games products and online sites, for internal marketing studies, or simply to collect demographic information about Monochrome Games users.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">Currently Monochrome Games restricts all collected data to Monochrome Games Forum usage and is not sold or shared.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><strong style="color: #adadad; font-size: 18px;">Corrections, Updates and Removal of Information
</strong>If you are concerned about the accuracy of personal information maintained by Monochrome Games or would like your personal information removed from Monochrome Games records, please contact us by emailing contact@www.monochrome-games.com for review, update, or removal of personal information.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><strong style="color: #adadad; font-size: 18px;">Contacting Monochrome Games
</strong>If you have any questions about this privacy statement, or the privacy practices of Monochrome Games, please contact us by e-mailing <a href="mailto:contact@www.monochrome-games.com">contact@www.monochrome-games.com</a>.</p>					</div>
